utilities

Class HeapSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.HeapSort

  • public class HeapSort
extends java.lang.Object
    implementation of heap sort. Called by the sorting manager and sorts the array. The method determines what the comparison type is and sorts it accordingly. Please see the mySort.txt in the root of the directory to see exact psuedocode
    Author:
    Hussein

    • Method Detail

      • sort

        public void sort(problemdomain.Shape[] array)
        calls the heap sort
        Parameters:
        array - array to sort

      • heapSort

        public void heapSort(problemdomain.Shape[] array)
        heap sort method. Builds max heap and then extracts the last element from the tree. Calls heapify on the new tree
        Parameters:
        array - array to sort

      • heapify

        public void heapify(problemdomain.Shape[] array,
                    int n,
                    int i)
        builds the heap. takes the root as the largest element. reads through the tree and swaps elements if they are found out of order calls heapify again to build the complete heap
        Parameters:
        array - array to sort
        n - array size
        i - root of the tree
